Description

Orbital Nine is a small indie developer making games that make you think. Our first game is Brain It On!, deceptively challenging puzzles for your brain. We hope you like it.

History

Early history

Orbital Nine was founded by Aaron Lake in Late 2014. Aaron has been making mobile, PC, and console games for over 12 years. In 2014 he decided to quit his job making games, so that he could make games more than full-time. Full-time was just not enough, now he makes games while he sleeps, while he showers, and while he eats his morning cereal.

Middle history

This is where we are now, more to come soon...
